channel.title: Tutorial section
channel.description: I thought the whole point of the section was not to make a [b]5 minute tutorial?[/b] I have just came across it. All tutorials in there break [b]every[/b] single rule. Every single thread is breaking all the rules. Posting in the wrong section, no teaching, no conventions. What is this, [i]Rugrat's go crazy Moparscape style?[/i] Lets see how many tutorials in the section are actually not breaking the rules.. Oh lets see that thread is breaking the rules, that one, that one, that one, that one... [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img158.imageshack.us/img158/4271/tutorialgj5.jpg[/img][/URL] Only [b]one[/b] out of 10-15 was good? What happened to the section?..This is supposed to be a learning community, not Tarzan's jungle house. :mad: This is probably the best place to put this. This is the RS2 Help section and I think people need help :). people better start to read the rules.

item.title: Tutorial section
item.dc:creator: @Trigger1 Trigger*
item.description:
@Trigger1 wrote:

So you are saying the duration of my total log in time has to do with knowledge?
And no thanks for mod, I’m not going to sit here all day deleting posts 1 by 1.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

lol he needs to grow up… the world is cruel… nothing can stop it… 1 kid can not change anything… its human nature to act this way… your either smart… or stupid… some cases your both… so either you choose to be here and handle the reality or you can leave and stop worrying about the forums and just handle it maturely.

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial section
item.dc:creator: @Trigger1 Trigger*
item.description:
@Trigger1 wrote:

I thought the whole point of the section was not to make a 5 minute tutorial? I have just came across it. All tutorials in there break every single rule. Every single thread is breaking all the rules. Posting in the wrong section, no teaching, no conventions. What is this, Rugrat’s go crazy Moparscape style?
Lets see how many tutorials in the section are actually not breaking the rules…
Oh lets see that thread is breaking the rules, that one, that one, that one, that one…

Only one out of 10-15 was good? What happened to the section?..This is supposed to be a learning community, not Tarzan’s jungle house. :mad:
This is probably the best place to put this. This is the RS2 Help section and I think people need help :). people better start to read the rules.

Read full topic
